Html:
Hi, I'm newbie for using PHPExcel Library. I used it with CakePHP framework.
I've tried to insert an image into excel file. But, when I try to set height and width using setHeight(), setWidth() or setHeightAndWidth I have same problem.
The image size doesn't fit with the input, for example, I set the image size like below:

$objDrawing->setWidthAndHeight(106,1000);

When I look image size in Excel file, width of this image is set like the input, but for height, it's corresponding with the width. When I check the scale of this image, I see that "Lock aspect ratio" is checked. I think it's the problem that the image size doesn't fit with the input.
Can anybody tell me how to disable this Lock Aspect Ratio,.?

Thanks,.

... hello any reply or respond to this post?? .. 
... i got the the same problem ..
